attributes.action: declare a moratorium on all pending extraditions of British citizens to the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Until the Extradition Act (2003) is reformed to require a prima facie case to be presented and won prior to any extradition, and until the USA stop abusing a law that was designed for terror suspects (see for eg Ian Norris, Brian Howes, Gary McKinnon etc), there must be, in the interests of justice and decency, an immediate moratorium on all pending extraditions of British citizens to the USA.
